title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Multimedia-Enhanced Mathematics Concept Reinforcement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 80% of basic mathematical concepts through multimedia-based interactive activities.
Learners can propose creative approaches more than three times in the problem-solving process using digital quizzes and visual materials.
Learners achieve a proficiency level of at least 75 points on average through integrated online/offline assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
